metadata.title: Adstrategic - Professional Software Development & Website Solutions
metadata.description: At Adstrategic, we develop custom technology solutions. We offer tailored business software and professional websites to transform your business operations and online presence.

sheetOpener.title: Request a web design & marketing proposal

reviews: Hiring Adstrategic was an exceptional decision for our internal booking solution
Adstrategic exceeded my expectations with their custom system for my logistics company
Their web and software development work improved our efficiency and professional presence
hero.intro: Boost your business with Software and Professional Websites
hero.paragraph: Elevate your business with custom software and professional web presence developed by Adstrategic.

cta.text: Do you want to be part of our ecosystem of partners?

software.title: Custom Software Solutions
software.description: We develop custom business software tailored to your needs, optimizing processes and improving operational efficiency.

step1.title: Needs Assessment
step1.description: We analyze your operational challenges and business goals to design the ideal solution.

step2.title: Feature Design
step2.description: We define user flows, key screens, and the functional architecture of the software.

step3.title: Iterative Development
step3.description: We build your system in modules, with functional deliveries and continuous reviews.

step4.title: Delivery + Support
step4.description: We install, deliver your software, and offer warranty or maintenance as needed.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: We build custom websites using modern web technologies, ensuring your brand is instantly recognizable and attractive.

step1.title: Design + Wireframe
step1.description: We outline all pages and sections of the site for a clear idea of the desired result.

step2.title: Branding + Content
step2.description: We personalize your website with your brand and company information.

step3.title: Review + Feedback
step3.description: We listen to your feedback so we can quickly make the necessary adjustments.

step4.title: Publish
step4.description: After final quality checks, we connect your site to your custom domain and publish.

testimonialsData.name: Harold & Vantroy
testimonialsData.content: Hiring Adstrategic for our video production and editing at Arca Group was an excellent decision. Their quality and creativity have significantly expanded our reach. The team's attention to detail and professionalism exceeded our expectations. We will definitely work with them again.

testimonialsData.name: Edwin Renteria
testimonialsData.content: Adstrategic exceeded my expectations with their design and branding work for my luxury car wash business, "Edwin's Detaling". They created logos, banners, slogans, and digital business cards exceptionally. I am very satisfied and will definitely hire them again.

testimonialsData.name: David Cruz
testimonialsData.content: Hiring Adstrategic was an exceptional decision for Casi's Shakers. Their web and graphic design, along with distinctive branding and impactful advertising strategies, have transformed our market presence. Their professionalism and attention to detail exceeded all our expectations. We will definitely work with them again.

testimonialsData.name: Alexander Reed
testimonialsData.content: Hiring Adstrategic for the design and branding of my air conditioning installation company was a wise decision. Their web and graphic design work has elevated our professional image, and their branding approach has been exceptional. Their attention to detail and creativity exceeded our expectations. We will definitely work with them again.

testimonialsData.name: Pablo Alzate
testimonialsData.content: Working with Adstrategic on our website development was an excellent experience. I can confidently say their work significantly elevated CIMA Produce Inc.'s online presence. The attention to detail, speed, and overall quality of development exceeded our expectations. We are very satisfied and look forward to working with them again in the future.

faqsData.header: How much does it cost to create a professional website with your agency?
faqsData.text: Our website development packages start at just $300, making it an affordable solution for businesses of all sizes. This includes a responsive design optimized for desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. For advanced features, customization, or larger projects, we will provide a detailed quote tailored to your needs. Affordable website development that delivers results is our priority.

faqsData.header: Will my website be responsive and fully optimized for online visibility?
faqsData.text: Yes, all the websites we create are fully responsive and designed to provide a smooth user experience on all devices. We also incorporate fundamental SEO best practices to improve your online visibility and ensure your site performs well in search engine rankings. For advanced SEO optimization, we offer additional services tailored to your goals.

faqsData.header: What is the estimated time to deliver a complete website solution?
faqsData.text: Our turnaround time for a basic static website with a few pages is usually one week. For larger or more complex projects, we work closely with you to define a timeline that ensures quality and meets your deadlines. Fast and efficient website delivery is one of our main strengths.

faqsData.header: What services are included in your website maintenance and support plans?
faqsData.text: Our website maintenance plans include content updates, design tweaks, performance monitoring, and security updates to keep your website running smoothly. Whether you need regular edits or occasional support, we ensure your website stays up-to-date and performs at its best. Trust us for hassle-free website management services.

faqsData.header: Do you offer custom website designs for my business's specific needs?
faqsData.text: Absolutely! We specialize in custom web design that reflects your brand identity and attracts your audience. From color schemes to interactive features, every aspect of your website will be designed to meet your unique business goals. Stand out online with a website designed just for you.

faqsData.header: What if I want to make changes to the initial website design?
faqsData.text: Customer satisfaction is at the heart of our process. We welcome feedback and provide unlimited revisions to your website design during the development phase. Your website will reflect exactly what you envision, ensuring you are 100% satisfied before the final launch.
